column4: I'm trying to install updates with apt-get, and it's trying to connect to ca.archive.ubuntu.com:80 (206.167.141.10), which is timing out. I'm guessing the "ca" in front means it's the canadian version of the server, is there a way to get it to connect to another server that wont time out?
maybe best to leave off the g and just do 's/ca.//'
